properties.areaDesc: Southern Saratoga; Schoharie; Western Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Western Schenectady
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 5 at 4:18PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wintry mix precipitation is expected during the Winter
Weather Advisory period. Total snow and sleet accumulations
range between 1 and 3 inches with ice accumulations from
freezing rain up to one tenth of an inch. Heavy wintry mixed
precipitation is expected during the Winter Storm Watch period.
Total snow and sleet accumulations range between 4 and 7 inches
with ice accumulations from freezing rain up to one tenth of an
inch possible.

* WHERE...Schoharie, Western Schenectady, Eastern Schenectady,
Southern Saratoga and Western Albany Counties.

* WHEN...The Winter Weather Advisory is in effect from 11 PM
tonight to 4 PM EST Thursday. The Winter Storm Watch is in
effect from late Thursday night through late Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the
ice. The hazardous travel conditions will likely impact the
Thursday morning commute as well as the morning and evening
commute on Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Allow extra travel time and drive
cautiously.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
